title: AMC Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 572 Sahayak Technical Supervisor Posts
description: The Ahmedabad Municipal Corporation (AMC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 572Â Assistant City Engineer, Assistant Engineer, and Sahayak Technical Supervisor Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for the AMC Notification 2026 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have me...
